alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 10:49PM MST until February 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Chiricahua Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon
